page.title: 08Verwood: the New School.
page.content: After the Summer Holiday,in September 1985 ,Verwood C.E. First School will move into its new building in Howe Lane.The new school has six class areas,three practical areas,a hall and administrative offices.It is designed to take 180 children to begin with but could be extended to take up to 300 should the need arise. The school will eventually share the site with a Youth Centre and the proposed new Middle School.When the latter will be built is not yet known. Local people want the school but would prefer it not to be a church school but the local authority would like the church to assist in funding it! Time alone will tell!
